org.jsfml.audio

Class Music

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
      • org.jsfml.audio.SoundSource
        • org.jsfml.audio.SoundStream
          • org.jsfml.audio.Music

  • public class Music
extends SoundStream
    Provides functionality to play music streams from common audio file formats.

    Audio files can be opened using either the openFromFile(java.nio.file.Path) or openFromStream(java.io.InputStream) methods.

    The supported audio file formats are: ogg, wav, flac, aiff, au, raw, paf, svx, nist, voc, ircam, w64, mat4, mat5 pvf, htk, sds, avr, sd2, caf, wve, mpc2k, rf64

      • initialize

        protected final void initialize(int channelCount,
              int sampleRate)
        Description copied from class: SoundStream
        Defines the audio stream parameters.

        Before the stream can be played, the implementing class must call this method.

        Overrides:
        initialize in class SoundStream
        Parameters:
        channelCount - the amount of audio channels (e.g. 1 for mono, 2 for stereo).
        sampleRate - the sample rate in samples per second.

      • onGetData

        protected final SoundStream.Chunk onGetData()
        Description copied from class: SoundStream
        Requests a new chunk of audio data.

        This method is called when the audio stream has played all buffered samples and needs new samples to continue playing.

        Note that this method will be called within a separate playback thread.

        Specified by:
        onGetData in class SoundStream
        Returns:
        the next chunk of audio data. If the chunk is marked as the last chunk, the stream will either stop playing after playing this chunk, or restart from the beginning if SoundStream.isLoop() returns true. To stop playback immediately, null may be returned.
        See Also:
        SoundStream.Chunk

      • onSeek

        protected final void onSeek(Time time)
        Description copied from class: SoundStream
        Re-positions the stream's current playing offset.

        This method is called when the stream is reset or a re-positioning has been requested via SoundStream.setPlayingOffset(org.jsfml.system.Time).

        Note that this method will be called within a separate playback thread.

        Specified by:
        onSeek in class SoundStream
        Parameters:
        time - the time offset to jump to.
